page.title: 09...... but NOT yet. !!!!!
page.content: We had a{Save Our School Disco.}The infants had a{Teddy Bears' Picnic. Susan's mum made T shirts. The J3's and J4's did the{Radio Sheffield Fun {Run.}My mum and Mrs Yellot walked down to the council. The adults had lots of meetings. Amanda Ellis's dad made a booklet about the school. Nicola Gibbin's dad did a survey of all the houses in our area. Then one day there was some{very {welcome news.}The whole school found themselves{cheering so madly}that the roof went up a few feet.{Our school {was saved.}There were ribbons in every window and we managed to get on the front page of the Star. Our school has been open a long time. My grandma came to this school and my mum did. Our school was made in 1842.{I think it {will stay open forever ! by children in J1 and J2
